newsitem.title: EGYPT: Egypt pound interbank o/n rates, one-week widen.
newsitem.headline: Egypt pound interbank o/n rates, one-week widen.

text.p: The range of overnight interbank rates on the Egyptian pound widened on Tuesday in a short private-sector market to between eight and nine percent from between eight and 8-3/4 percent on Monday, bankers said.
"Liquidity is short because all the money has gone into the latest treasury bill auction," said one banker.
The Egyptian treasury on Monday accepted bids for 182-day treasury bills worth 1.445 billion pounds, replacing bills worth 991 million pounds.
One-week rates also widened to between eight and nine percent from Monday's eight and 8-3/4 percent, banker added.
Bankers said that public sector banks kept their official minimum lending rate steady at 10-1/2 percent.
